title: Social Health Literacy Education Using Virtual Patient Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of medical terminology and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Learners, as ordinary citizens, are interested in solving community health issues and engage in collaborative learning in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain neurological disorder symptom assessment procedures with 80% accuracy through virtual patient simulations.
Learners can present decision-making rationales considering social factors in patient diagnosis during post-simulation discussions.
Learner groups can propose three practical strategies for community health promotion in final projects, incorporating simulation experiences.

resources: Virtual Patient Simulation Platform Access Permissions
Neurological Disorder Case Study Resource Collection

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
